DESCRIPTION: Counts monsters currently summoned. Maximum of #b5 Summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yRandomized monster to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random monster in your hand to 1.

Certain cards (like Monster Reborn) allow you to Resummon monsters. When you Resummon a monster, it replays the card, ignoring #yTribute costs. Some monsters have extra effects that trigger when they are Resummoned.
Removes X #ySummons. Unless you have enough #ySummons to #yTribute, you cannot play a #yTribute card.
Increase your maximum #ySummons by the number given.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to increase all of your buffs by #b1. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #ySpellcasters. NL #yEvoke: Gain a random #ybuff that lasts for #b2 turns.
#yOrb: #ySummon #b1 #ySpellcaster #yToken at the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: #yIncrement #b2.
#yOrb: Sets the cost #b1 random card in your hand to 0 when #yEvoked. At the start of each turn, increase the number of cards that will be reduced.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yRandomized #yDragon to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random #yDragon in your hand to 1. NL #yUpgraded #yDragonOrbs add #yUpgraded #yDragons to your hand, and set the cost of #yDragons in hand to 0.
When a card with #yOverflow is in your hand at the end of the turn, activate an effect. This effect has a limited amount of uses.
Can only be played if #yToon #yWorld is active. If you Tribute a Toon monster using another Toon, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
Tokens associated with the #yMagnet #yWarrior monsters. #yMagnets have no inherent effect.
Add #b2 #yRandomized cards to your hand, they cost #b0 this turn. Gain #b1 random #ybuff. Apply #b2 random #ydebuffs to an enemy.
When you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, gain #b1 #yStrength.
When you attack, if all the monsters you currently have summoned are #ySpellcasters, gain #b4 Block. You need to have at least #b1 #ySpellcaster summoned to trigger this effect.
When you #yTribute an #yInsect monster for another #yInsect, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When you #yTribute a #yPlant monster for another #yPlant, apply #b4 #yConstricted to ALL enemies.

When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant monster for a #yPlant, apply #b4 #yConstricted to ALL enemies. NL When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant for another #yPredaplant, apply #b1 #yConstricted to ALL enemies and gain #b1 #yThorns. NL #yPredaplant monsters are treated as #yPlants.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add #b1 #yRandomized #ySpell to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Set the cost of #b1 random #ySpell in your hand to 1.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to #yChannel a random offensive #yOrb. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #yDragons. NL #yEvoke: Increase your #yOrb slots by #b1.
#yOrb: Whenever you play a card, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Reduce the #yTribute cost of #yDragons (everywhere) by #b1 for the rest of combat.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, trigger #b1 random effect. If all monsters summoned are #yMachines, trigger the effect twice. NL #yEvoke: Trigger #b2 random effects.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to #ySummon a [#FF5252]Shadow [#FF5252]Token. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #yZombies. NL #yEvoke: #yResummon #b2 random monsters from your discard pile on random enemies.

#yOrb: Whenever you trigger an #yOverflow effect or play a monster with 3 or more #ySummons, deal #b7 damage and apply #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL #yEvoke: Increase the #ySummons of monsters (everywhere) by #b1 for this combat.
When you #yResummon a #yZombie, gain #b6 Block.
When you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend, place #b1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another #yAqua, increase the #ySummons of all monsters in your hand by #b1 for this turn.
#yRandomized cards may have their costs changed, #yTribute costs reduced, #ySummons increased, may #yExhaust, and may become #yUpgraded or #yEthereal.
Cannot be #yResummoned.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to heal #b1 HP for each monster summoned this combat. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #ySpellcasters. NL #yEvoke: Heal #b3 HP for each monster #ySummoned this combat.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yTribute #b2 and gain #yTemporary #yHP equal to the total energy cost of all tributes multiplied by the number of tributes. NL #yEvoke: #yTribute ALL summons and gain a random #yBuff equal to the amount tributed.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yDexterity until the end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Play a random #ySkill you have played this combat on a random enemy.

#yOrb: Deals damage to ALL enemies when #yEvoked. Damage amount changes to a random number between #b1-15 at the end of each turn. Each time you #yTribute a #yZombie, the damage potential is increased.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, activate the #yMillennium #yPuzzle. NL #yEvoke: Choose and add #bX #yRandomized cards from the card reward pool into your hand.
#yOrb: At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to half the number of #ySpells played this combat plus #b1. NL #yEvoke: Gain #yMetallicize #b4.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b2 #yPoison to a random enemy. Apply double #yPoison if all monsters summoned are #yInsects. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b3 #yThorns.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yIncrement #b2. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b3 damage to a random enemy for each of your max summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b2 #ySlow to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b5 #ySlow to ALL enemies.

#yOrb: Whenver you draw a monster, increase the #yTribute cost by #b1 and increase the damage by #b4 for this turn. NL #yEvoke: Sum up the total #yTribute cost of all monsters in your hand. Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to this sum.

#yOrb: Add a #yRandomized Power card to your hand at the start of turn. NL #yEvoke: If you have any empty Orb slots, consume one and reduce the #yTribute cost of all monsters in your draw pile by #b1.
#yInvert is the same as #yEvoke, except that you also #yChannel an Orb that is the 'opposite' of the one you #yEvoked.
Whenever you #ySummon a #yNaturia monster, it deals #b1 damage to all enemies at the end of turn for the rest of combat as long as you have at least 1 #yNaturia monster summoned.
When you #yTribute a #ySuperheavy for another #ySuperheavy, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
Every other time you #yTribute a #yMachine for another #yMachine, gain #b1 #yArtifact.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to apply a random debuff with #b1 stack to a random enemy. You have a higher chance if all monsters summoned are #yFiends. NL #yEvoke: Add #b1 #yRandomized #yFiend to your hand.
If an #yImmortal card is in the discard pile, gain [E] at the start of turn.
50% chance to trigger the action given after this keyword.
At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to the amount of #yMetallicize stacks you currently have.
When played, the power of one random effect of this card is increased by #b1.
Power cards that enable #ySpellcaster synergy #yTribute effects. You can only have one #ySpellbook active at a time.
Considered to be ALL monster types (Aqua, Dragon, Fiend, Insect, Machine, Naturia, Plant, Predaplant, Spellcaster, Superheavy, Toon, and Zombie).
Playing unique pieces of #yExodia will add #b1 to your #yExodia power.
Can be #yUpgraded more than one time.
Debuff that chooses a random type of card. For the rest of combat, all cards of this type cost #b0. Whenever you play a card of this type, trigger a random negative effect.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, draw #b1 card. NL #yEvoke: Draw #b2 cards. NL Water is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: No passive effect. NL #yEvoke: Copy and gain a random enemy buff. NL Glass is unaffected by #yFocus.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, gain #b2 #yStrength until end of turn. NL #yEvoke: Apply #yVulnerable to a random enemy #b1 time(s).
Giants are powerful monsters with high costs and unique cost reduction effects that trigger from any pile in combat. When played, these cost reductions are reset.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, siphon #b2 HP from a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Take damage. Damage increases as you siphon.

When you gain #yBlock via the #ySpellcaster effect, you gain additional #yBlock based on how much #yMana you currently have. #yMana resets to #b0 when you trigger it, and at the end of the turn is set to the number of #ySpellcasters you currently have summoned.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies, gain #b1 #yEnergy and #b5 #yBlock. NL #yEvoke: Choose a random #yGate effect at the end of each turn, but with twice the power.
